Download Fryars’ “The Boy In The Hood” Mixtape, Featuring Lily Allen

posted by Constant Gardner on October 28, 2014 in Audio
« PreviousShift + ← Next »Shift + → 1 of
Image via Ooh Brilliant

For a little while there, it looked as if Fryars‘ sophomore album was going to be stuck in limbo forever, but happily it now has a firm release date (November 18) and label (Fiction). Anticipation was high over a year ago when we heard the brilliant pop of tracks like “The Power” and “Cool Like Me,” but with under a month until POWER is released, Fryars (Ben Garrett) has released something a little different—a mixtape called The Boy In The Hood. 

I wrote and recorded most of it in between working on Power… it’s not a bunch of offcuts but a different beast. This record exists in the night time. It’s a night out. From being home alone to upping sticks and going out on the town. Power exists in the daytime, for the most part. This is the B-Movie to my album. Enjoy

The mixtape features lots of Fryars’ clever wordplay, backed by a mix of glitchy electronic production and crisp keys or strings. There’s also a song with Pre-order POWER here.

02. On Your Own PT. 2 (4:05)
